let leafletJS = document.createElement("script");

let jqueryJS = document.createElement("script");

let dtJS = document.createElement("script");
dtJS.src = "https://cdn.datatables.net/1.13.6/js/jquery.dataTables.min.js";
document.head.appendChild(dtJS);
